plot: In a small town in the countryside, five people are assailed by the same terrible nightmare. The arrival of a miserable pilgrim will break out the internal conflict in which they live, determining a rupture in their lives.
title: O Homem Que Não Dormia
plot_es: In a small town in the countryside, five people are assailed by the same terrible nightmare. The arrival of a miserable pilgrim will break out the internal conflict in which they live, determining a rupture in their lives.
plot_en: In a small town in the countryside, five people are assailed by the same terrible nightmare. The arrival of a miserable pilgrim will break out the internal conflict in which they live, determining a rupture in their lives.
